data.title: How to say good morning in German in 45 appropriate ways
data.meta_description: Become a master of good morning in German, beyond Guten Morgen! We'll teach you the classic, regional variations, good day & plenty more.

New morning, new luck

Now that youâve mastered saying good morning in German, you can move on to asking the other person their name or how theyâre doing.

For a lot of people, mornings are the best time of the day to study because the mind is still new and fresh and itâs often easier to focus - but if your studying isnât going well, just remember that there is always another morning to try again. In fact, the German word for tomorrow is âmorgenâ, the same word as the one for âmorning.â

German-speakers like to say âNeuer Tag, neues GlÃ¼ckâ (New day, new luck) when they try something for the second time after it didnât work out on an earlier day. Thatâs what you should be telling yourself if you ever skip a lesson or lose your motivation to learn German. Each new morning is a chance to get right back on track.
